name: Sachin Jain
summary: Specializes in Internet, distributed systems, embedded systems, and network protocols with a focus on scalable, fault-tolerant architectures and high availability solutions.
work_history: Cohesity: Principal Engineer (Nov 2015 - Present) - Architect and developer for distributed task execution frameworks, protection of database and cloud workloads, and Kubernetes infrastructure. Insieme Networks/Cisco Systems: Principal Engineer (Apr 2012 - Nov 2015) - Principal architect for SDN controller, distributed No-SQL databases, and multi-site configuration syncing. Google: Staff Engineer (Mar 2006 - Apr 2012) - Led stream quality improvements for Google+ and special projects for Google Maps data acquisition. Cisco Systems: Software Engineer (Feb 2005 - Feb 2006) - Designed Private VLAN features and next-gen ethernet for data centers. Andiamo Systems/Cisco: Software Engineer (Feb 2001 - Feb 2005) - Developed routing protocols and high availability infrastructure for Fiber channel switches.
project_history: Developed a distributed key/value store using rocksdb for Cohesity's file system. Led the architecture and technical direction for scalable backup/recovery solutions and cloud workload protections. Built a scalable, fault-tolerant SDN controller for large data centers. Implemented quality and precision improvements for local business listings on Google Maps.
skills: Distributed Systems, High Availability, Big Data, Kubernetes, NoSQL, SQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Cassandra, HDFS, RocksDB, SDN, Ethernet, Fiber Channel
education: The University of Texas at Austin: MS in Computer Science (1999-2001). Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi: B.Tech in Computer Science (1995-1999). Delhi Public School - R. K. Puram: High school (1993-1995).

Sachin Jain
Principal Engineer / Architect
Fremont, California, United States
Summary
Specialties: Internet, Distributed systems, embedded systems,
network protocols
Experience
Cohesity
Principal Engineer
November 2015 - Present (9 years 3 months)
San Francisco Bay Area
- Architect and development for a distributed task execution framework used
for scalable backup/recovery for various workloads (VMs, DBs, Filers) both for
on-prem and Saas offering
- Architect and technical direction for protection for all database workloads
including SQL/Oracle and large NoSql DB (mongo, cassandra, hdfs) 
- Protection of cloud workloads (SQL on Azure, Azure AD)
- Architect for kubernetes infrastructure for running 3rd party applications on
cohesity platform
- Implemented metadata store for cohesity file system (distributed key/value
store using rocksdb)
Insieme networks/Cisco Systems
Principal Engineer
April 2012 - November 2015 (3 years 8 months)
San Jose
Insieme networks was cisco funded startup building SDN switch for large data
center. Acquired by cisco in Dec 2014. 
Principal architect and lead for building the scalable, distributed, fault tolerant
SDN controller.
- Architect and tech lead for distributed No-SQL database for centralized
controller (sharding, leader election, failover etc). 
- Architect and lead for multi-site configuration synching. 
- Scaled the controller to 400 switches and 1M endpoints.
 
Page 1 of 2

 
 
Google
Staff Engineer
March 2006 - April 2012 (6 years 2 months)
Mountain View, CA
- Lead for Stream quality for Google+ (Google’s social networking platform) :
Improving the user experience of stream by filtering and personalized ranking
of posts.
- Maps data acquisition : Special project (Ground Truth) to create and fix maps
vector data for entire US. Smart tool for geo modelling making use of aerial,
street view, output of various computer
vision processing.
- Tools/system to improve quality and precision of local business listing data. 
- Maps Wiki - End user can edit and fix maps data (http://www.google.com/
mapmaker)
Cisco systems, san jose
Software Engineer

Part of Data Center Business Unit. Designed/Implemented Private VLAN
feature and part of architecting next gen ethernet for data center.
Andiamo Systems/Cisco
Software Engineer

Cisco funded startup building Fiber channel switches for Data Center
Worked on routing protocol, infrastructure to maintain hardware routing tables,
high availability infrastructure
